sense.gloss: to shave (wood, leather, etc.), to sharpen (e.g. pencil), to plane, to whittle, to pare, to scrape off, to erode
to cut down (budget, expenses, staff, time, etc.), to curtail, to reduce
to delete, to erase, to remove, to cross out, to strike out

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑鉛筆↑↓えんぴつ↓は|↑削↑↓けず↓る|↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がある。
したがって↑生産↑↓せいさん↓↑費↑↓ひ↓を|↑削↑↓けず↓る|↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓がある。
sdata.e: Therefore, it is necessary to reduce the cost.
